resources.string: Welcome to space, the infinite frontier!
HEY! Let me ask, what\'s your favorite planet? (pick as many as you want!)
Mine\'s the sun! Always has been. I like it because it\'s like the king of planets.
HEY! Have you ever seen an eclipse? You know if you stare at it head on it\'ll burn your eyes out.
I once took a pair of binoculars and stared at the sun for over an hour.
HEY! We all know that the moon is not made of green cheese. But what if it were made of BBQ spare ribs, would you eat it then?
I know I would. I\'d have seconds and then polish it off with a tall cool budweiser.
HEY! How bout this mad cow disease? It was here for a while and then it went away, your thoughts:
Geez. I hope I never get it.
HEY! What about this? If you had a choice between these, what would it be?
Oh good, I was worried you\'d choose mad cow.
